description.@en: Having reached the ultimate stratum of Magickal practice, you have discovered the secrets of your Daemon. Unraveling these devoted mysteries, you call forth unearthly and befouled sorceries at your fingertips, distorting reality around you.

effect.@en: You can now attempt to learn Greater Magick from the Covenant your Expert Profession granted you, provided you possess at least three Skill Ranks in Incantation. In addition, you automatically learn one Greater Magick spell from your Covenant.
